name: Kux-PowerPoles
title: Kux Power Poles
author: Kuxynator
description: In this first version are only 2 but new power poles. Both are replacements for a huge number of small power poles used to span an area. The first ones spans over 32x32 und the second one spans over 64x64. The cost are only slightly higher than if you build the grid one by one.
